clues.text: This "tyrant lizard king" was the most feared meat-eater of its time

Total number of days in all the months whose names end in "ber"

rounds.comments: (Alex: These are national parks all over the world, not just in America.)

clues.text: Lake Windermere, this country's largest lake, is located in its Lake District National Park
Ye gods! You'll find Olympus National Park in this country

Sport in which you hit a ball with a club; in fact, its name backwards means to beat harshly

It can precede horse, continent or "Side of the Moon"
Date of the next leap year day

2 great astronomers born in February--1 in Poland in 1473 & 1 in Italy in 1564
